products.name: Steel Welding Rod
products.description: High-quality steel welding rods suitable for all kinds of welding work. Durable and reliable for long-term projects.

products.name: Industrial Welding Torch
products.description: Professional welding torch for industrial use. Ensures precision and safety during welding operations.

products.name: Aluminium Sheets Pack
products.description: Pack of high-grade aluminium sheets, perfect for construction and fabrication projects. Corrosion-resistant.

products.name: Welding Helmet
products.description: Safety helmet for welding with auto-darkening lens. Protects eyes and face during welding tasks.

products.name: Metal Grinder
products.description: Durable metal grinder for smoothing and shaping metals. Suitable for industrial and commercial applications.

products.name: Custom Steel Gate
products.description: Tailor-made steel gates with decorative patterns. Strong, durable, and built to last.

products.name: Welding Clamps Set
products.description: Set of welding clamps for holding metal pieces firmly in place during welding. Easy to use and durable.

products.name: Portable Welding Machine
products.description: Compact and portable welding machine suitable for on-site jobs. Efficient and easy to operate.

products.name: Metal Cutting Saw
products.description: Powerful metal cutting saw for precise cuts on steel and aluminium. Perfect for workshops and construction sites.

products.name: Safety Gloves for Welding
products.description: Heat-resistant welding gloves to protect hands from sparks and hot metal. Comfortable and durable.
